get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of articles with optional filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search keyword for title or description

description.example: Tesla's stock is rebounding after a tough stretch.

post.description: Saves a new article to the database.

description.example: An in-depth analysis of the latest trends in technology.

title: The title field is required.
published_at: The published_at field must be a valid date.

get.description: Retrieves a single article by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the article to retrieve

put.description: Updates an existing article in the database.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the article to update

description.example: An updated description of tech trends.

title: The title field is required.
published_at: The published_at field must be a valid date.

delete.description: Deletes a specific article by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the article to delete

get.description: Triggers jobs to fetch articles from various news sources.

get.summary: Fetch distinct categories, sources, and authors
get.description: Returns a list of distinct news categories, sources, and authors from the articles table.

message.example: Too many requests, please slow down.

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token.
Allows an authenticated user to reset their password.

password_confirmation: The password confirmation does not match.

post.description: Registers a new user and returns a success message.

password: The password must be at least 6 characters long.

post.description: Logs out the authenticated user by revoking all tokens.
Stores the user's preferred news category, source, and author.

example: The category field must be a string.
The source field must be a string.
The author field must be a string.

message.example: Too many requests, please slow down.

get.description: Fetches news articles based on the user's saved preferences (category, source, author). If no preferences are found, returns all news articles.

title.example: State Department had a plan to buy $400M worth of armored Tesla vehicles

description.example: State Department was in talks with Tesla for armored EVs.
